name: Autumnus (Vorpal Lamb Studio)
description:
Autumnus is a game where the goal is to relax and enjoy your walk through the forest, and let's be honest, after the year we've all had, we deserve a rest.

You play Autumnus, the spirit of autumn. Travel through the valley of spirits, and use your magic to usher in the season of harvest. Unlock new abilities and visit a variety of biomes.

While the game has no true ending, it takes roughly 30 minutes to explore, collect all four upgrades, and access all the biome areas. There are 20 little rock spirits hidden around the world that you can find and wake up. There is no save state, so closing the game restarts it. Technically this game takes place in one room. If you get lost, don't fret! That's part of the fun! Just keep walking and you'll find your way.

Controls:
WASD: Movement.
Left Mouse: Interact with the world.
Space: Jump

Credits:
Art: https://rotsuoy.itch.io/

Check out some of our other projects!

Known Bugs: (Daz would fix this, but we didn't want to make changes post-submission.)

- The completion percentage displays incorrectly. To get a correct value multiply the value by 10. (Does not effect gameplay)

- All the rock spirits in the cave are under the map. 3 of them are reachable with left mouse click. 4 of them is unobtainable in the current version of the game.
